steps.title: Foundations
steps.objective: Build essential groundwork for your career
tasks: Set up your learning workspace
Create a study schedule
Join relevant online communities

children.title: Industry Fundamentals
children.objective: Understand the core concepts of bid manager
tasks: Mentor junior peers and document advanced workflows
Connect with professionals in the field and request informational interviews
Lead a capstone or team project solving a realistic problem in bid manager
Target specialist or leadership roles and craft a research/experience summary
Build a public portfolio showcasing projects related to bid manager

children.title: Tools & Environment
children.objective: Set up your professional workspace
tasks: Research standard tools for bid manager
Install primary software tools
Create account on professional networks

steps.objective: Master essential skills for bid manager
tasks: Create a skills tracking spreadsheet

Find a mentor
